name: Disco Assassin
description:
Browser version does not represent the final quality of the game.

For a better graphics and audio experience, please download the build.

-----------------------------------

Disco Assassin is a Stealth game where the player has to find and neutralize different targets while dancing to blend in the crowd.

This game was made during GGJ 2022!

Diversifiers:  Take A Break

-----------------------------------

CREDITS

Alessio Landi

Armando Guerra 

Davide Colimoro 

Matteo Scarcella

Paolo Conte

Vincenzo D'Elia

-----------------------------------

KEY BINDINGS

MOVE: WASD

DANCE: Q

GRAB: E

CROUCH: CTRL

KILL: LMB

ZOOM: RMB
